dhtmlxCombo
Actions

Using API

View page source

Manipulate list content and appearance using Combo API methods

set text
set new label for second option
clearAll
reload
delete selected option
get current combo text
get selected text
get selected value
Source
<script>
window.dhx_globalImgPath = "../../codebase/imgs/";
</script>
<link rel="STYLESHEET" type="text/css" href="../../codebase/dhtmlxcombo.css">
<script  src="../../codebase/dhtmlxcommon.js"></script>
<script  src="../../codebase/dhtmlxcombo.js"></script>
 
 
 
<div id="combo_zone" style="width:200px; height:30px;"></div>
<table width="100%"><tr><td valign="top">
<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="z.setComboText(document.getElementById('ctxt').value)">set text</a> <input type="text" id="ctxt" size="10" value="combo"><br>
<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="z.updateOption(2,2,document.getElementById('labtxt').value,'')">set new label for second option</a><input type="text" id="labtxt" size="10" value="New label"><br>
<a href="javascript:z.clearAll();z.openSelect();">clearAll</a><br>
<a href="javascript:z.clearAll();z.addOption([[1,1111],[2,2222],[3,3333],[4,4444],[5,5555]]);z.openSelect();">reload</a><br>
<a href="javascript:z.deleteOption(z.getSelectedValue());">delete selected option</a><br>
<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="document.getElementById('info').innerHTML+='Curren text '+z.getComboText()+'<br></a>'">get current combo text</a><br>
<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="document.getElementById('info').innerHTML+='Selected text '+z.getSelectedText()+'<br>'">get selected text</a><br>
<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="document.getElementById('info').innerHTML+='Option ' +z.getSelectedText()+' with value '+z.getSelectedValue()+'  is selected<br>'">get selected value</a><br>
</td><td width="50%"><div id="info" width="100%" height="200"></div></td></tr></table>
<script>
var z = new dhtmlXCombo("combo_zone", "alfa", 200);
z.addOption([[1, 1111], [2, 2222], [3, 3333], [4, 4444], [5, 5555]]);
</script>
